CheckExists(Grid, int, int, int, int) - Method in class Model.Piece
This method moves piece from current position to target position, then runs all possible moves, and checks whether the move is possible.

chooseFigure(int, int) - Method in class Controller.TurnController
This is called when player, presses a button on the checkerboard, it either shows possible moves, makes a move if the button is highlighted as possible move, or does nothing if you can not move the pressed piece.
